// Pivot 0, 0
int pinball[14] = {
	47, 480,
	40, 480,
	40, 583,
	118, 605,
	122, 590,
	47, 567,
	47, 482
};

// Pivot 0.000000, 0.000000
float pinball[14] = {
	0.126344f, 0.727273f,
